Reviews.Title: “good value for money”
Reviews.Author: vogensen
Reviews.Content: wife stayed seasons nights carnival break february chose belonging accor dependable value money airport connexion shuttle strange reason pick hotel departure drop cant pick driver didnt anyway hotel night spent tiniest seen ground floor wasnt suitcase floor wasnt minute checkin booked months ahead available desk deemed logical hotel morning chatting girl reception friendly mentioned shocked cubbyhole immediately moved decent quarters perfect totally adequate noise street below appliance heating water plenty tea instant coffee envelopes television plasma wall facing bed breakfast included rate excellent plenty variety types croissant cold cereals including muesli yogurts variety jams eggs bacon coffee machine produced delicious capuccino women breakfast filipino outgoing friendly greeting else hotel staff trained satisfy customers location goes hotel quiet closer museum quarter central train station minutes walk tram stop van gogh museum 15 kilometers walking slowly 12 minutes kilometer 18 minutes lidl supermarket meters east avenue west van seemingly nonstop ethnic restaurants mainly oriental persuasion cash machine front roots restaurant 123 sadly encounter bedbugs didnt blood enticing conclusion considering lodging expensive amsterdam definitely recommend seasons

Reviews.Title: “Bed bugs nightmare”
Reviews.Author: roger d
Reviews.Content: booked march 2012 sadly read trip advisor prior reviews trusting hotel accor sofitel co hotel clean mistake infested bed bugs management totally irresponsible renting completely aware woke morning discovering bed bugs bed mentionned management denial tried situation nighmare started days covered head toes hundred bites nasty difficult rid considering following reviews below recommend avoid hell

Reviews.Title: “OK"”
Reviews.Author: StaffsLass66
Reviews.Content: excellent location trams centre amsterdam clean hotel linen changed daily strange bedroom layout watch step breakfast somewhat floor reception below ground level experience sleepless night noise stay request floors

Reviews.Title: “great hotel”
Reviews.Author: carrie1-12
Reviews.Content: hotel perfect wasnt huge reasonably priced clean warm breakfast nice buffet style breads cereals meat cheese etc sandwich toaster own toasties staff pleasant helpful front hotel overlooking canal noisy visited february central taxi organised hotel hotel airport 25 minutes cost â‚¬40 stay

Reviews.Title: “Small double room”
Reviews.Author: TravellerInAsia2011
Reviews.Content: hotel 5 days double annoying location close tram staff breakfast bad

Reviews.Title: “very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: manchestert15
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights jan 9th hotel clean breakfast included staff friendly helpful day allowed leave luggage free charge free internet available hotel wasnt center easy acces fine buses close lots shops restaraunts corner market reccomend hotel friends family

Reviews.Title: “Can Be Better”
Reviews.Author: Ben N Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: overall hotel acceptable hope improve housekeeping breakfast table housekeeping change towels beds daily understand change floor towel nights stay change agrees comments website morning breakfast variation menu nice compliments ladies reception excellent helpful actions helps overall stay recommend friends stay

Reviews.Title: “nice city”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: liked ams realy nice city hope visit hotel bad fair ther noise hear outside reception bad hotel service bad

Reviews.Title: “Basic, clean, but great value”
Reviews.Author: evelynecwhite Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: picked hotel based ease access centraal station rai 1 minute walk 4 tram goes centraal chose price reasonable pleased value money hotels ammenities cost twice merely theyre stops closer center seasons nice location canal balcony overlooking canal restaurant called roots corner plenty fast food convenience stores walking distance downsides amsterdam basic bathroom shower bath hairdryer doesnt poor lighting bedroom none factors id stay time bring own hair dryer

Reviews.Title: “normal hotel”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: normal hotel average business stay fancy cheap stuff comfy nice clean relatively bathroom clean clean shower 3 minutes walk metro 10 minutes walk amsterdam centre

Reviews.Title: “Ok hotel but overpriced”
Reviews.Author: EMT999
Reviews.Content: stayed seasons hotel weekend hotel nice clean free wifi 20 minutes walk square 30 minutes red light district china town street parking garage 45 cars hotel 10 euros night extra try cheaper hotel time dont feel worth money

Reviews.Title: “Look elsewhere”
Reviews.Author: Rodney K
Reviews.Content: moment stepped tram central wed mistake maybe expectations reading traveller reviews hotel suit entrance unappealing reception revamp greeting warm apart overall staff fine reviews lift slowest floor found quicker stairs time didnt smell nice entering balcony nice overlooked main road noisy breakfast ordinary wasnt included price wouldnt bother didnt toaster maker toast bread thrid morning hot food ran breakfast due ordinarily figured doing favour worst location walking unless walking lot fault relying peoples reviews tram maybe okay youself favour closer horrible

Reviews.Title: “Great stay for a first visit to Amsterdam!”
Reviews.Author: filmwilliams
Reviews.Content: wed amsterdam doing lot googling decided hotel easy reach visit value half term week expected getting trams single speedy walker walk pretty amsterdam stroll youll probably tram rembrandt plein close food drink bell hotel staff team welcoming speak english arrived airport 10am checkin isnt 2pm guy reception straight note pay city tax arrival ours 4 nights 4th floor lift slowest lift world makes hilarious noises welcome alternative steep wooden stairs noise 406 perfect 4 night stay twin beds pushed safe tea coffee facilities shower plenty storage 3 mirrors downside hairdryer strange looking difficult ive added picture cos dont descriptions justice recommend taking own day daily service nice bonus beds leaving fresh towels unfortunately cleaning teacups spoons breakfast girl likes food disappointed tuck yum return train ticket notice hotel shuttle airport â‚¬12 finally found sizeable supermarket 5 mins bridge hotel building sign sell 6 pack heineken snacks course

Reviews.Title: “Great! And so near to everything!”
Reviews.Author: TheLittleEstonian
Reviews.Content: decided couple days amsterdam beginning february looking hotel found quality hotel reasonable price hotel nice 15 minute walk city centre rembrandt square dam square 20 minutes walk red light district 15 minutes van gogh museum ones 2 trams connecting hotel centre parking available hotel pretty luxury central amsterdam additional fee 25eur day sundays parking street free basic nice comfy beds bathrooms short break heating fixed notified reception staff helpful trying local information serve breakfast hotel opted decided town instead happy stay

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for a long weekend in the 'Dam”
Reviews.Author: kittyandkids
Reviews.Content: seasons hotel brilliant bargain weekend location slightly city centre south east hotel roughly 20 minute walk town plenty nice restaurants etc taxi wise 10euro station quiet clean walking distance major museums etc food price includes decent breakfast normal continental breakfast complete traditional toastie maker staff friendly professional mega clean compact flat screen plasma teacoffee etc warm downsides downside alarm morning wasnt major

Reviews.Title: “Bit of a mixed bag, but generally ok”
Reviews.Author: Me_n_my_rucksack
Reviews.Content: visited amsterdam cold spell 2010 booked hotel moment getting reasonable price club handy trams 10 mins walk metro searched hotel offered free breakfast hotel ad promised complimentary breakfast informed booking attract free breakfast special rate breakfast 75 euros found breakfasts slightly local cafe happened complained bookingcom 25 euro rebate 2 days hotels fault bottom stairs common imagine amsterdam economy hotels steep lift basic comfortable tea coffee sachet day mind facillities hotel front quality wall mounted tv lots international channels including bbc1 bathroom bath deep plumbing bathroom bath nice complimentary smellies standard free wifi hotel internet min 30 mins 2 3 euros check flights told tickets password tickets amount tickets larger periods time consumate larger cost receptionist check flight status huge disruption due snow token effort declared website password printer problematic wifi internet access pricey receptionist duty arrived friendly constant change staff cheerfull english aspect hotel reasonably bedbug sheets idea bedbugs look returning home googled reasonably little bed bug bit apple seed moves bit summary hotel reasonably priced reasonably comfortable probably worse hotels due various staying amsterdam id try else

Reviews.Title: “Average, clean, modern, but not worth the money”
Reviews.Author: Ben-aus-Rostock
Reviews.Content: hotel located central amsterdam 15 min walk rembrandt square tramstation outside 15 min center 10 min city center street main roads circling city center obvious week days due noisy traffic hotel 45 collegues ground floor directly facing lobby means passes taking wooden stairs elevator mention breakfast besides lobby window sliding door completely shut night sleep window entry hall building buildings hotel stairs road outside window invitation night kidding hat normal windows staff friendly helpful clean furnished modern lcdtv international channels bathroom 1 sqm shower wc corner people short legs sit comfortably wifi internet bookable 2 min lobby pc price breakfast simple 3 types white bread croissant scrambled boiled eggs soft 3 types juices 2 types packed jam peanut butter cheese ham salami vegetables single prize 9 euro dont book summary prices 130 euro double 100 single beginning july maybe upper floors facing backwards alright basement

Reviews.Title: “A good base to explore Amsterdam from”
Reviews.Author: AlexNLeicestershire
Reviews.Content: found hotel base explore amsterdam little tram stop street trams ran 10 minutes wait basic clean tea coffee facilities bathroom clean breakfast bright airy food plentiful staff polite recommend buy travel pass enables boats unlimited 7euro day found efficiant time train station hotel approx 20mins

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for a weekend trip”
Reviews.Author: tanabanana87
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel night hotel booked overbooked transferred hotel staff nice helpful toddler sorted travel cot hotel convenient heineken museum nice eat central bit pricey opinion deal wont disappointed

Reviews.Title: “As comfortably as staying home”
Reviews.Author: Clifton73
Reviews.Content: wife lucky visit amsterdam week nice weather staying hotel trip perfect comfortable sleep plus quiet night reception staff matter day shift evening shift friendly lot information city hotel close museum district 10 minutes foot reach famous van gogh museum national museum tram stop front hotel city center 10 minutes breakfast hotel pretty eat everyday home choices corn flakes jams booked weeks arrival hot deal available qualityprice definitely stay hotel time visit amsterdam suggest friends
